pages.text: Humanoid golem is a player-like golem. It can use armor, meelee weapons, and shield. Right click the golem with equipments to equip, and shift-right click the golem to un-equip all. If you shift-right click with empty hand, the golem will be retrieved naked as well. Right click the golem with empty hand to retrieve the golem with equipments stored within.
Humanoid golem can perform area attack if and only if it holds a sword-like item.$(br2)Humanoid golem can use shield, but can be bypassed if the enemy attacks from behind or holds an axe.
